properties.title: Forecasted data
properties.description: This dataset provides an ensemble of forecast time series of gridded hydrological data. The data set is a product of the Global Flood Awareness System (GloFAS) and offers a consistent representation of key hydrological variables across the global domain.
properties.usage notes: data download via interface or API
